Here is the best place to know what we really do and how.

Each product and service offered by Credit Warehouse is based on careful research of the African Credit Eco-system. You can also reach out with your unique needs and we would reach out to you.We offer several services that improve on transparency, accountability and fairness in giving or receiving credit.

How to sign up

Click on "Create your account"

Fill in the request details

Check your email to verfiy your account

Select the service you want and start using it

For our corporate customers, you would need to submit company registration information as part of KYC requirements

Contract Manager

With the Contract Manager, individuals who lend cash, or offer goods and services on credit to their family and friends can create legally binding e-contracts. This builds trust and ensures that all parties understand their responsibilities as well as the penalties if there is a default.

For our premium customers, we ensure you get your money back using our cash recovery partners.

Bonus

As a debtor, if you can prove to us that you used our platform to access loans and successfully paid on time 3 consecutive times, we guarantee you an increase in credit limits and better interest rates.
